content: Edit5: What I would like to see is the ability to link 2 Palaces together and similar units instead of having to put a platform to link them up. I'd also like to see some optimization for longer games. I've got a total of 5,000 units on one of my saves and it seems to crash somewhat frequently.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. UPD: Few hints about that: 1. You can tap on already built modules to see what they produce and what they need. 2. Above units panel you can find 'Help' button, it will take you to help section. In help you can find small descriptions for all buildings in game.

content: Love This great game
replyContent: Thanks for reply. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with screenshot of this situation and I will tell you why it's happening.

content: Great game really! So much fun. Gets frustrating sometimes though i.e. Levels 69 and 75 you need pills for biobait but what the friendly base needs can't be added to the junkyard. It would be nice if there's some more documentation about how to do things like that
replyContent: Thanks for reply. In junkyard UI you can tap on mineral icons to change the type of requested minerals. This way you can bring any minerals to junkyard. If that didn't help then please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com), I'll help you.

content: Really great game.

This is an awesome game! My favorite game in fact (thats why I have the pro version). Easily five stars, but I had to deduct one because the game is super bright. Its basically 97% white screen. Thats bad for bedtime and bad for OLED. I'd love to trade the fifth star for some kind of night/dark mode. ;-) (Awesome! Yiotro replied! Yes, I know, a dark mode would be quite some effort... But it would be so awesome! Is there any way I can convince/help you to make it?)
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Would be nice to have dark mode but I would have to redraw all graphics in game, so I can't currently promise that.

content: A great, fun game.

Matchmaking takes too long for a mobile game, for the reference, most other devs implement bots to avoid long waits when there is too few people playing. Matches only with randoms isn't the most interesting thing to keep ppl engaded and playing. The online multiplayer model of online chess would be appropriate.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. You're probably talking about cheepaska (this is achikaps pro) :)

content: Can't play enough of this game. It is easy to learn with some great challenges! My biggest frustration is user levels that are truely not possible. I wish devs would test before posting.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with names of user levels that you think are unbeatable.

content: Love it! Little workers doing their thing :D

Easy 5 star in my book and great to support the dev.For just a small price its just a better version of achikaps and I love achikaps.Its editor is what I think most use in this version and why they get it.I after spending way to much time on achikaps would say its a good game and I hope they make a new more polished game like this in the future.Though there other games are fun to i believe this one is the best.At the current writing of this to it still gets updates here and there.
Best developer out there.
It's great. But there's no way I can get over level 64 and I've played it 20 times already probably. You should unlock all the levels in the pro version.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Hmm, please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about this problem, I'll help you with level 64. I can also tell you how to skip campaign levels easily.

content: Incredible game, well worth supporting the developer. One way the game could be improved would be for the "auto" button to be a toggle, so that it continually updates & re-balances assignments. Or, have 2 "auto" buttons, one which is a one-time update when pressed, the other being continuous auto. Perhaps also a way to keep the objectives open instead of having to re-open them every time the player wants to check progress. And then more detailed states about buildings, like prod. rate.
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: Amazing 100000000000 out of 200 stars
replyContent: Thanks for reply. You can play any of your maps in level editor. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I will tell you how to do that (it's easy) :)

content: Bought the pro version. I enjoy the game. There are many things to learn for new players and there should be a separate section that explains how the game works in detail. The first few missions serve this purpose but they pop-up dialogs are not enough, and if I forget anything I have to play them again. Also, the construction interaction is cumbersome, especially if I change my mind and want to build from another module. Better to tap the plus button from the screen and drag from any module.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Check out 'help' section, you can find it above unit workgroups panel (or in game options -> info -> help). About construction UI: in your variant player would still have to make early decision about where to build new module because it would be impossible to move camera after you entered build mode.

content: Bought the pro version just to support dev Yiotro. This is one of the best games I've played on Android. No bloated graphics, no ads, only offline play. Music is repetitive, quirky, and fulfilling. Sometimes my 'units' get confused or stuck on platfos, but other than that this game meets many of my needs.
Amazing game.
Simple to learn but hard to put down. Rymdakapsle or something this game reminds me of! Oh ya I have developed a new hate for helicopters since playing this game LOL.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Hint: turrets have bigger attack range than helicopters and are able to bait them closer (so lasers can do the damage).

content: Good game although editing (the reason I paid) is bugged, no units spawn when you select a number of units and connected buildings appear as a job that needs resources to be built. A suggestion: Add an in-game option to enable waves any time you want during the game (if they were deactivated). I, at least, enjoy building a fortress calmly and then test if the enemy can bring it down.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I know about problem with editor but currently I wasn't been able to reproduce it. Would appreciate if you email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with more details about it. Also, if enemies are disabled you still can trigger enemy wave, do this: open 'tasks' panel and then tap small button in top right corner of that panel.

content: Great fun. Infuriating at first, then increasingly compelling. Well worth it. Those damn helicopters though!!!

I like the concept in general but it annoys me to no end that the time between enemy attacks seems to get shorter and shorter and instead of having a smart way to deal with assignment of combat units you have to manually adjust the sliders each time. Plus there appears to be an enemy unit that just explodes your entire base? Dev addressed my issues with his response, rating changed.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Few hints: 1. Use lasers, they don't directly require units to shoot. 2. You can enable 'auto' button in game options, it will manage units for you. 3. Enemy drones plant bombs on your base. These bombs will explode in chain reaction if triggered. You can burn them in junkyards.

content: Very good and clever game. Simple but pleasant! Bought it in order to support the good effort! Thanks a lot!

A perfect game that has good and simple gameplay. This game is worth the price, and provides many hours of fun. I love this game for it simplicity, and I respect the developer for not shoving a lot of ads into the games.

I gotta say, this is the most well thought out game I've ever played, to me, the pro didnt offer that mich when I bought it (2 years ago, I think), but I wanted to buy it to support the devs. But since all of these new updates, I gotta say this game has come a long way, thank you for making such a good game.
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: it's a great game. I wanted pro version just when I played first time. Really excellent. But, I need to say: it's very hard build your own game. Yiotro needs to make it easier. I see a lot of options in campaign or other user games I can't do the same: make a road between two modules (not platforms) reward for task complete Change what altar needs change what module needs to produce something. I talk about smeltery and others, no just house and meat grinder. I rate 5* if i learn.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Free and pro versions update simultaneously. All features that are available in free version should be also available in pro one. About editor: I'll think about it.

content: Good, but the enemy bases are evil. They destroyed my mine, making me fail the entire colony!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. With proper defense enemies shouldn't be able to destroy your stuff. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with screenshot of your base and I will help you with some hints.

content: i swear this publisher makes the best games on android. i installed this in 2018 and still come back to this one, it's addicting, it's FUN, and it has 0 ads and 0 microtransactions. With that said, I'd love it if there was some kind of 'donate' button somewhere, cause publishers like this should be rewarded for their amazing work.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Sadly, I have technical problems with receiving donations. But if you want to further support me, you can buy pro versions of some of my other games.

content: An nice and simple game
Best game ever. I bought the pro version to support the developer because they deserve it.
If there was something to complain about I wouldn't have bought this after playing the free version. Not many developers can make a good quality mobile game.
Very good game but seems like unit management needs an update as I assign them to production etc then the just stay on platforms and do nothing...
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Maybe some of those production buildings are deactivated due to lack of electricity? If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about this problem and I will help you.

content: How do breathe?
Excellent game. Original. Well thought out. Diverse gameplay. Great free version with no ads is available, but was so good, I paid for the full version. This dev's other games are also excellent!
Really fun game and good time waster, This update is nice, update may 5th, 2020
After it being on my phone for a day all my problems with it seem to have stopped and it is playable now! Good game!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about this problem, I'll help you (but I need more details to be able to do that).

content: Another buet of a game for this person. I do believe it has had some flaws but those flaws quickly leave and this game and others are great thank you for all you do.
So if a repair unit is not required can you make drone have the Ability flying around and mit patrol ein Auto destroy this big Spider
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'll think about it.

content: One of my favourite time killing games! Bonus no stupid ads üòÅ
What an incredible game! 100% worth paying for the pro version. The developer continuously is updating and improving a stand-out game. One of my all-time favourite games for android.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I am frequently adding new stuff to the game and this new stuff can possibly break some levels in campaign. So I will change campaign levels after I slow down with changes to the game.

content: This game is so genuine. Such a simple game, but it seems to always draw me in! I appreciate the fact of a full free game, but getting even more for the very reasonable price of the pro version. Thank you!
I love the concept I love how simple it's kept, this is how every mobile game should be, but they rarely are. I was very happy to buy the pro version to pay the developers some money, thanks a lot!
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: Fantastic original game. The gameplay is truly original. Free version is ad free and purchase free . Pro version worth buying. A must have for any discerning mobile strategy gamer.
Really great strategy game.
This is the best offline strategy game you can play on a potato. The lack of graphics is actually good. Lesser battery drain on your system and simplify gameplay
Good game
Outstanding game. I purchased the pro to support the developer efforts.
Interesting little game, just started playing and immediately bought the full version when i read the devs statement about respecting the player and not filling the game with ads. Major props to you
Love this game. Addictive, FREE and NO ADS. You are awesome. I bought this game mainly to support your efforts. I played you other game Antiyoy which is also great game

Lots of fun and challenging! I like seeing other people's created levels and playing them. My only suggestion would be under the "materials" tab we should be able to tap on a material, see what it does and the recipe and building needed for it. This game is great with an active dev, well worth your dollar!

I have been playing a lot of games from this developer because they're just so good at they're job, worth more then it costs, (to all you "Oh My GoD wAsTe Of MoNeY" people, it's a way of supporting them because they dont include ads) 5 stars, give it a try üëç By the way if the creator sees this review I would like to say that if you want people to have another way to support you, you should make a little tab in the menu were they can put a amount of money they can donate, just an idea!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Sadly I have technical problems with receiving donations.

content: Absolutely Great Game. Already have hours into it. The only thing that I would want from it now is a way to have respawning enemy bases in sandbox.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Well, if you destroyed one enemy base with bombers then you will easily destroy any other enemy base after that. So I'm not sure if that will change anything :)

content: Very responsive developer who responds when there are issues! Great game. The paid version is very worth the cost...lots of play time.
Defenitely worth paying for this.
Almost perfect! I love this authors whole range of "8bit strategy games"! (edit: Ah yea, agree mob perf+batt is v. important)
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Well, the problem with such algorithm is that it can be very slow. And performance has one of the highest priorities (considering the scale of the game). So I can't promise that I'll implement it.

content: This unusual little gem is an outstanding game. I've seen nothing like it before. I downloaded it years ago. I still play it, and have enjoyed watching it evolve throughout these years. This game simulates a bio-mechanical fortress with an ongoing metabolism that can live or die based on your judgement. The first steps are critical but the game offers multifaceted difficulty settings. So grow well and maintain overlapping fields of fire-power while managing your resources wisely.

Fantastic game! I've lost whole days playing this. My tablet battery is constantly drained, and my life is on hold. If anyone seriously objects to paying this guy a dollar for this pro version they are mad! It's worth 5! Thank you so much. The gameplay is simple to start with, but gets ever more complex. So many scenarios too. Way worth the pro version!
replyContent: Thank you for such good words :)

content: I can't stop eatrey
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'll think about adding 'deactivate' button to eatery in future updates.

content: Great game!
I fell in love with the free version and decided to buy it and support developer. I think you make the best free and paid games! Antiyoy was such fun too! Thanks for countless hours of fun!

I played this on my plane ride back home after having it in my game folder for a while and I must say what a fun and unique little game it was! When I saw the price of pro I was more happy to purchase it and support the creator. I played it the whole way back and was still amazed at how simple yet complex, fun game this was!
Great fun, the pro version is well earned support for the developer.
...I‚ù§Ô∏èThis Game

i absolutely love this game its the exact type of base builder resource management/balancing game i have been looking for... that being said one problem i find with the game is its longevity in enjoyable play. longer you maintain a base the less you want to play and i think a scaling upgrade system would fix this. for example allowing repeating reseach upgrades to make enemies harder and the base better.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Hmm, this is an interesting idea, I'll think about it.

content: Love your game. I have one issue with the editor thoe. Recipes for me seems to be broken for me as I am unable to change the Input of the meat grinder now. I could send a screen shot. But I can only change the input of the lab, unit creator and the bomb workshop. I find this a little limited. If it's by design then alright. But would be cool to change more input/output options to make different chains. Thanks again! ~Gil
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yes, please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with more details about this problem.

content: Some very time consuming flaws but otherwise very good. Occasionally a module will fill with one type of resource, stopping production completely. Occasionally a module will not get resources at all even if the required resources are being overproduced and other modules using the same resources aren't using up all of those resources. I would suggest also adding to the help menu, for instance, being able to tap on a resource in the help menu to access a list of ways to obtain it.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. About production stops: you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with screenshots of these problems and I will help you.

content: Great game
Awesome game, playing from year and new features still appears. Strongly recommend!
Awesome game! üëç
5 stars as always! Buy the app and support this developer, people! One suggestion I have is the ability to customize more recipies because right now we can only do 4.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I may do that in future, but can't promise that right now.

content: I love it its awsome

Like it very much, bought a pro version to support the developer. The only thing is that sometimes the tasks make me puzzled. For example - decrease the amount of units. When they are eaten by bioreactor - it doesn't fulfill the task, when they are killed by palace - too. So how can I do it?...And I have already killed all enemies, so cannot try and make a unit be killed by opponent.. Nevertheless brilliant game that I enjoy!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. This is a task in sandbox mode, so you can ignore it. The idea is that you have to decrease your units to target quantity (which is quite small usually) and be able to rebuild them after that (which can be tricky).

content: Worth buying if you like the free version as there's loads more levels

Simply a brilliant game and a fantastic time killer. It's refreshingly non-commercial and focuses on excellent playability rather than fancy graphics and stylish menus. Highly recommended for all fans of strategic games.
Awesome, and well worth the price to support the developer üòä

This game is really fun, and I find it to be kind of addictive. At first it was kinda complicated but after a while, thanks to the totourial, creating working recourse chains became routine. Overall I love this game and how you respond to all the reviews and try to fix problems instead of creating a game and forgetting it. So thanks for this amazing game.
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: An amazing game, definetly buy this!
Best mobila game I have played
Highly addictive with classic graphics
This is an amazingly well made game. Its entertaining, simple, but very deep.
Love your games. So creative and fun. I finished all the ones on the free version and wanted more ! Hope you'll keep making some !
Haven't played too much but looks great, and still geta updated. bought it with some spare money and it is absolutely worth it!
Strategic, fun and so cheap! I would pay ¬£5 for a game this good anywhere else!

Hi this is 1 of my favourite games ever! I spent hours (I mean daysüòÄ) on the old version & to be honsest brought the premium version just to support you! Love everything about this game I just wish I knew what the transmitter does. :) Also please add a science upgrade to give bomb planes more defence against enemy lasers.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Transmitter allows you to see 'blessings' and activate them once their conditions are met :)

content: Achikaps is an awesome game and with achikaps pro it doesnt add many more features, But you do support the developer. This is a great idea and it is a good time killer really worth your money. As for after you have completed the levels there isnt much else todo One of my requests would be a more diplomatic or challenging aspect to it like new enemies or diffrent ally's But one of the key features i would greatly love would be multiplayer.

love love love this and all the other games by yiotro. I played the free version of this for so long and loved it. The pro is really great if you manage to get bored because you can play on other user's levels and make your own, As other reviews have said. 11/10! Thankyou so much for making an amazing game! The only thing I think the game needs is to make a way to get rid indestructible modules maybe with another module that costs a few chewing gum and uses a few for each module destroyed.
Lovely time sink
This game has kept me going for hours. I love how dynamic it is.
A rare gem.
good

Love this game. I finally paid for the goodies. It's fun to begin with. When you get bored, pay the dollar. It is never the same twice when you build your own campaigns. Well developed. No glitches, ever. It's as easy or hard as you want. I can't find a better game. I get bored really fast. Now that I have the editor, I'll never get bored again.

An awesome economy strategy game. The game is really simple once you understand the basics but at the same time highly engaging and highly addictive. Controls could be a little better though. Overall great value for a dollar or rupee in my case.

great game, really happy to pay for this game and support you, thank you for keeping it affordable, I'm excited to see what else you go onto produce. I would definitely put it up in my top five games ever played. good work
decent
GREAT APP(kinda sinilar to the free one) also could you please lower the the battery usage by 40%
I love it please add more battery uses
Best game I have ever payed money for. Definitely recommend trying it
An excellent economic strategy game. I bought the pro version to support the developer, after many hours on the free version. Thanks for the great game, Yiotro!
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: I played the free version for a while and learned of the level creator and extra campaign levels. I got this version and an having fun with the extra features. Definitely worth the cost, I would say.

this game is awesome. buy it. dev deserves it. very simple, that slowly becomes very complicated. palaces that are fed and sated by bubblegum, trade partners that become over friendly and start pissing you off with their candy... it's abstract and minimal, yet gorgeously complex. thumbs up mate, well done. this reminds me of the best and slightly weird games from 8bit/16bit era in terms of its design and humour. something I don't see often these days.
great game
PLEASE CONTINUE TO MAKE MORE GAMES. this is a great game, awesome UI, and mechanics. wish there were more games like this.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yes, I will make more games in future :)

content: it's a great game! but I'm confused as to the new update... what exactly des euphoria do... it confuses me, if ya respond, please explain the mechanics if the euphoria meter and the effects it has as it goes higher edit: oh, I see now, I was a bit confused at first, thanks for the reply! I really needed this information.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. The idea is quite simple: player has to keep euphoria low or else friendly base will become crazy and will deliver candies to player base until there is no free space. Best way to do that is to build a pacifier. Also, feeding friendly base with minerals would reduce euphoria.

content: Top game! (if you like strategy)
Engaging, fun base builder. Simple, elegant, great.
Edit: bug seems fixed! I love this game.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I wasn't been able to recreate this bug, but I made some changes that may help.

content: please make some more campaign levels!! :)
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I may do that in future, but I don't want to make same (repetitive) levels. Maybe in future I'll come up with a way to add variety to campaign levels. In this case I'll definitely use it to make more levels.

content: What a great game you have here... üòä üòä Good job Yiotro... I love you work and of course I'll support you with buy this pro version... üòä üòä

It is so rare for game devs to rely just on donations and that's why you are one of the few game devs that i actually gave my money. (TBH I would like to donate you more that one buck so could you please donation button to the game?)
replyContent: Thank you for your support. I live in a country that makes it hard to receive donations, but if you want to further support me you can buy 'bleentoro pro'. Also, in future I plan to make more games with pro versions.

content: it's fun, gets boring fast though, but it doesnt take up much space, and it's still in development I guess seeing the new "euphoria" update, I got clogged up with candy and realized that was a new challenge to overcome.

Units AI prioritizes unusable structures over critically importand. you will literally spend more time fighting your own units and ally base than the enemy. also you cant see if a building can fit there untill after you placed it
replyContent: Thanks for reply. About units: you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with screenshot of this problem and I will help you. About building placement: you can long tap construction plan to relocate it.

content: Top top app. Just amazing.

I love these types of games (If you've ever seen how much time I've put into Factorio you'd know that I'm not joking), and I love that it's still being updated with new features. Keep up the good work! P.S. Glad to see some of my suggestions in the game

content: An extraordinary economic strategic game. It worth the price.

content: Very fun game. The tutorial helped alot. Some levels prove to be a good challenge. One issue that I have and I'm not sure if I'm doing something wrong. Fantastic and fun little game. I emailed him a bug that came up immediately after an update. The response I got instantly was to download the new update he just put out. Super fast response to bugs on a fantastic game. Other devs, take notes.
game got bugged after an update, around a day or less, it got fixed, you deserve more than my donation, respect earned,,

thanks for creating a great add-free game. i gladly support the dev :)

An awesome great game. True to the yiotro form if you ever played those types of games before.

love that simple
oh my goodness
Gladly purchased to support the developer for a great Android game. Thank you for not putting adverts in the free version and I hope others hit the purchase button.

content: bough this just to support you. even though in not very good at this one. keep up the good work!
awesome game, especially for those who like RTS games.
Excellent!

content: I really like this game, but I want to know what the delta time means. any information on that?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Enemy waves come more frequently with time. Delay between them decreases every time. Delta time is the value that is subtracted from delay time each time new wave spawns.

content: Truly basic and amazing with so many staged. Please support the Dev. This game is worth every penny. No ads or donation begging. Please support Devs like this.
Really cool game!
Awesome game! It would be even better if you could add more unit types, like tanks or mechs, that you can manually control. Having a soldier ‚óè class that you can send into battle would be amazing!
killer game. best in class with no garbage ads/paid nonsense.

Love the game. Played the free version for awhile and decided to pay for it. Help support it's creators. Best of all, it took less then 2 minutes to download on .2 gig internet speed. Would be awesome if you could upload different songs that shuffle.
played the free version up to lvl 20, enjoyed the game play loved the no ads, so decided to download the pro version thank you for the great game
replyContent: Thank you too for good reply.

content: Played free version for 1 minute then bought paid version! Want to see more strategy games on mobile, keep up the good work!
I think it is an amazing game
good, simple but strategic
Amazing! This game keeps getting better and better with endless content updates every other day! I love it.

It's good but I keep getting glitches. 1.If I edit the recipes in editor mode and play the new save, the recipes revert to the normal recipes. 2.Sometimes the sliders get stuck and move together. 3. I can't add enemy rounds in editor mode. Suggestions 1.It would be cool of I could restrict where units can go, like keeping them near my factories. Maybe a circular range that confines them. 2. I would like to change the end product as well as the components of the recipes. 3.Since this is the pro version, I would like to be able to disable electricity on randomly generated save files. 4. In editor, I want to be able to change module requirements like making lasers need metal to work. 5. It would be cool if I could summon enemy colonies if I decide I want to fight them in a peaceful save. 6. I'd like to be able to seperate my colony by deleting a platform between them and using only the units I have in each colony.
replyContent:
Thanks for such a big comment :) 
I am limited by 350 symbols here, so please duplicate your comment to my email (yiotro93@gmail.com), this way I will be able to give detailed answer.

content: Really Awesome. Best game ever!

üÜï (scroll down) | Editor mode needs the ability to edit more recipes, give rewards for completing tasks (unless I'm missing something), change construction costs, change what modules produce, make deposits of more than metal/bones, additional items for custom use (I suggest use of the items from Bleentoro for this) and possibly even editable variables, such as; how often a factory produces items, how many items are produced each time the ingredient items are consumed, how large a module is, rate of turret fire, AI base growth, to name a few possibilities. üòÖ | Another fun feature would have to be creating your own fleet - though this would require a large amount of resources and effort (not to mention a map large enough to be compatible). | üÜï Suggestion: a module that produces suit items (i.e. wearable suits, aka 'armour' or 'clothing') for units, that, when equipped, the item is consumed (the unit is now 'wearing' it, and there would be a graphic indicator of some sort to distinguish the suited unit from another) and the user unit can now do one of the following: carry multiple items; produce items faster; shoot at enemies faster/consume less ammo (this will depend on the unit's occupation) - these are just a few suggestions for unit enhancement traits. | I've also found a problem/bug (I don't know whether this is intentional) where drones are unable to carry items to and from modules unattached to each other. If this is changed, I suggest making this an option in the editor (disabled by default, but enabled in non-editor maps), in case a map requires the player to reach said module via roads, etc. | Other suggestions: option in settings to toggle right/left-hand traffic on fast roads, and an option to disable the moving background because it hurts my eyes (it is cool though) | So many suggestions - I wonder how much time & effort it would take to implement these.. üòÖ
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. UPD: I'm limited by 350 symbols here, so if you want to discuss your ideas then please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) :)

content: It took a little bit to figure it out at first, but got me hooked on it in the process. The developer is awesome and amazingly responsive!
very efficient
best moble game ever. once you understand the game mechanics it get's better and better

If you like resource management, strategy games and are fine with simple graphics, don't hesitate, just get it. Great game, tonnes of content, gets harder and later levels may need repeating before you figure out the strategy, which is a good thing.
Hilarious game! One of a few I paid for. Played for 6 hours total and immediately bought full one, it's totally worth it, could've pay way more!
Nice game, developers are active in development and they do it for enjoyment so it is not overpriced. Tip: setting for count of workers on factories,mines etc.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. About your tip: it may be interesting, but I don't see a good UI solution for that. All solutions that I can think of require a lot of tapping (for each production building), which is not really a good thing. Also, you can control rate of production by building more buidlings of one type.

content: What an awesome game!!! Started on the free and then jumped to paid version. Thanks for the great game!!
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: Suggestion: dark theme? Black background so it is easier to look at at night? Otherwise this is a wonderful game! It is smooth to play and everything is made to work nicely. The price is certainly worth it!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I have this idea in plans, but it would require redrawing all images in game, so I  can't promise that I'll implement it.

content: This is worth the money, which is actually a really good price! You don't see good simple games of this caliber on the internet for this cheap of a price. Even the free version is awesome and has no advertisements. I would recommend this to anyone that has a brain.
Loved the free version so much that I wanted more. Nice to support an ethical dev. Well done Yiotro!
I love what you have done with this since it's early times! If you were to do anything more in sure it would make everything even better!
üî¥Uses A LOT of RAM (1.3GB of 4GB)!üî¥ I was averaging about 70% - 80% Great game, though!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Hmm, on my pc it eats somewhere around 200 mb of ram. I think that it just depends on system, it may allocate more memory than needed.

content: Very addictive yet simple strategy game, I love it

This game is a minimalist version of so many great strategy components. There are no unnecessary graphics and components. I am always excited to see what is going to be added next. If I could only have one game on my tablet, this would possibly be it.
You are the reason, I learned Java and now starting to make apps on my own. Your Ideas are good and the game are absolutely easy but addicting. With that buy I want to thank you.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Nice to hear that I inspired someone to learn programming :D

content: The pro is just like the free version; just wasted a buck.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Well, pro version has much more campaign levels. It also has level editor and number of save slots is not limited. There is nothing crucial because I didn't want free version to feel like a limited demo. This pro version was made so people can support me, that's the main reason behind it.

content: One of the best games and developers I've seen on Android. With the mosquito update however, level 72 is close to impossible. It has taken me weeks to complete. Please review this level.
replyContent: Thanks for bug report. UPD: Yes, I will make mosquitoes weaker and slower in next update. They are kinda too hard currently.

content: I don't usually buy games on Android, but after the free version, I just wanted more. And that's a very reasonable price.
Amazing game, but... I don't really understand the point of the new garbage factory. The drones are a great addition though.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yeah, you can just ignore garbage factory. It just adds some slight diversity to gameplay, that's why I added it.

content: I've not played a ton of it yet but I tried out a little bit of the free version. I don't buy apps often. But due to the fact this dev does give you a bunch for free with no ads to speak of. (And I wasn't hounded for a review.) I would have easily dropped $4-5 for the game. But for a dollar? Sign me up!
Went and got a dollar because this game deserves it :)

Redownloaded the free game recently and loved it, especially the no ads, so much that I had to buy the full version. It would be nice though if you could add a soung effect for the planes, like propellers maybe.
Needs a way to skip past the levels available in the free version!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Pro version should load all progress from free version on first launch. But it won't happen if you deleted free version before that (this action deletes all saved data). You can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I will tell you how to skip those levels.

content: I just wish you could tweak recipes of all things, like structures and such. Maybe even being able to make a fleet of your own. Also adding more neutral nations that have all the powers Player nations have and enemies can attack those as well.
Fun RTS scaled down for mobile play.
Excellent, engaging game.  I love it!  I just wish there was a way to reset campaign progress.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. You can actually do it. Just go to game options, tap 'more' and then tap 'reset' in top right corner.

content: Great game! Really enjoy playing!

Great game, please make more levels :) Edit: one and a half years later I still play this game. The developer keeps updating it with quality content. I still would like more levels, but other than that, it's an amazing game!

Involved and complex, the best of the genre.
This game is fantastic in every way.

Unable to work out level 129. Can't construct mine, leaving no way to solve

replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yes, there were some problems with level 129, but they should be fixed now. Please check out latest update.

content:
Beautifully simple at first but can give you quite a challenge later on, 
the gameplay is great. A confirmation when destroying a node would be 
useful though, a slipup when your base is covered with mines can mean the 
end of it.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. If your base if covered with mines then I would recommend to get rid of them as quickly as possible. Just burn them in junkyard (enable 'burn all' and 'ignore sources' in junkyard and increase request for bombs).

content:
Love the games ,it is really fun and only improvement you could make would

Lovely thing. Challenging enough to be fun. Worth every penny.

Crazy addictive. Achikaps had me stolen away there for a while.. To be a

Another amazing game with fantastic mechanics by Yiotro.   Some things I think could be improved though is that the campaign levels are very repetitive and don't really seem to increase in difficulty except for maybe a few exceptions.  There are some great and creative user made levels, maybe use some of those for the campaign?  Bombers are too OP, I'd recommend enabling the enemy to shoot them down.  Also require building/crafting airplanes, similar to drones or even houses, where you can have a total of 4 for each airport.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yeah, I agree, campaign needs to be more diverse. I plan to do something with it in future. And yes, when player gets bombers it's game over for enemy bases :) But they are not really a big threat in the first place, so it's not that bad.

ah yes another amazing game by Yiotro, fantastic time killer and seemingly

This is such a simple game. But it's challenging and addictive right off 
the bat. It is somewhat confusing figuring out the mechanics, units,

try and beat the level that's evading your victory. Frustrating, but oh so 
satisfying!

Excellent little game, and just the game I've been looking for to play on

I truly respect the developer because he respect gamers. It's also a very

Excellent game. Well worth the pro version. Probably the best android game

Definitely my favorite android game -- very creative and unique.   With the 1.18 release, I've noticed cargo drones don't seem to be able to transport resources between disconnected parts of the base, even though they were able to before. Was that intentional, or am I just using the new cargo stations incorrectly? Thanks!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Many players were confused by cargo stations, so I decided to completely remake how cargo drones work in new update. Now they just automatically do same tasks as carry units. If you want, I can explain in more details about disconnected parts, just email me: yiotro93@gmail.com

replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I actually plan to add player's planes that act like fighters. About infinite worlds: it's super hard to do, I don't think that I can do that yet :)

content: Simple but addictive minimalistic "Settlers"

content: Thank you for great game. Buying pro version just to say "thank you" and support you. Respect that you didn't put any ads to free version.  Gameplay is amazing.

This game is AMAZING, to say the least. I have downloaded this game time and time again as I get new devices. üòÇ I would like to push the idea of being able to enable/disable the electricity function (similar to how we can have or not have enemies, etc.). Oh, and it would also be nice to edit Sandbox games in the Editor mode. Thanks so much, and keep up the great job Yiotro.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Actually there is already an ability to open sandbox games in editor. Email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I will tell you how to do that. About electricity: hmm, is it really that annoying that you want to disable it? :)

content: Amazing, if you like abstract real-time strategy.

Awesome! Have suggestions though: 1. A module that allows for helicopter recruitment. Helicopters are the same as enemy helicopters. They attack enemie bases and units. 2: add a teleporter building / module. Allows for units with or without supplies to teleport long distances. Uses much batteries. 3: sniper tower. The same as a regular turret tower only as lower rate of fire an has much longer range. Hope these ideas were any good!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. 1. I plan to add something like that in nearby updates. 2. Teleport would break some optimizations and will also increase complexity of algorithms, so I don't think that I can do that. 3. This may be nice, but with longer range it will need to scan much bigger area for enemies, which will cause much more lag.

content: One of the best mobile games I've  played and yet one of the simplest to understand!

Having trouble with level 44. There doesn't seem to be a way to build the turrents and bomb workshop/airport fast enough and maintain them before you're overwhelmed on both sides by the base and waves.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yeah, this level looks hard. Here are few tips: 1. It's better to pause altar in start of the game. 2. You just need 2-3 turrets and 10-15 units in them to defend against enemy base. 3. It's better to use lasers against usual enemies. If that doesn't help then email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I'll try to help.

content: Came from the free version which sold me with the clean interface and great gameplay.

Great game but just wanted to say that level 109 is very tricky without the bomb workshop and airport unlocked. No way to build turrets and lasers fast enough to overcome the Gatling guns on the enemy base. Please fix!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I'll give you few tips on this level. Basically, you already have minerals for 3 turrets. So you just have to build them immediately. And also build few platforms near them to avoid damage from sad robots explosions.

content: Best game of this kind ever
Feb 22 2018 is my birthday.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Well, happy birthday to you then ;)

content: One of the best RTS games on mobile

Towers behave inconsistently making it hard to understand what your situation is between levels.  This is a major flaw, since you could get half way through a level before you realize that this time you need to power your buildings, or that you need ammunition, when you didn't need those things in the previous level.  If once you learned about a system you needed to do them from then on it would be better.  Or at least could have a better visual representation of the differences. Also you absolutely need a mine, a factory, and a farm and you can't build some of those if you don't have the resources that they produce, meaning there is this strange part at the beginning of each level where you need to count all available resources to make sure you can build them or you will just run out.  It is inconsistent with the rest of the level where you can make slightly inefficient moves and be fine. Enemy difficulty spikes in a few places and feels unfair.  The helicopters can be devastating and the defenders don't redistribute to compensate automatically.  It feels unfair.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yeah, I agree it can be confusing at times. The rule is simple: if you can build ammunition then you'll need it, same with power station. But it's easy to forget about them. Sorry, I'm limited in 350 symbols here, so if you want more discussion then please email me: yiotro93@gmail.com

content: Came here from Achicap original game.  Love the building, fun way to pass time.  Developer did nice job adding new pieces as your skills evolve

AMAZING game for a rts&simulation nerd like me. I think its one of the most brilliantly designed game in Google Play. A masterpiece like that definetely needs multiplayer modes, singleplayer bores eventually.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yeah, multiplayer would be nice, but I don't think that I can do that. Maybe in future when I'll have more capabilities, but can't promise that.

content: Amazing game, only 4 out of 5 stars because it desperately needs multiplayer option.

Yiotro is one of the best game developers I've seen and the way they make their games is absolutely fantastic! To thank them for 0 ads and 100% enjoyment I naturally had to put some of my money towards you guys. Great job!
Great game wish there was more structures to build
Error on 137-139 control panel turns black if you are using platform quick build. Will email the screenshot if I can replicate it
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. UPD: Looks like it's a problem with new update. I uploaded fix for it few minutes ago. Should be available shortly.

content: Love this game. At first, it's simple. Later, it becomes a real challenge.
as with everything this developer puts out this game offers fun and engaging gameplay with very little bs normally associated with mobile games. well done

Worth every single penny
It is good

Supported the developer. Because he makes such simple yet awesome games. Thanks keep up the good work. Hope you don't abandon this game because I already recommended it to my friends. Hope to see more updates and more contents.

content: An absolutely fantastic game!  What looks like a very simple game at face value is actually very complex and engaging. I bought the pro version because I enjoyed the free one so much. Thanks for a truly great game.
Great economy game, challenging, fun, lots of variety
10 stars. Love the game.
Best game ever!
One of the best games in the store. Keep up the good work Yiotro

I have been playing the free version for a while now and at this price I could not say no to the paid for version. Love the game.  I want to say that it is brilliant the way the game is constantly being updated with new features. There are a lot of developers who could learn a lot from Yiotro
replyContent: It's good to hear that you liked the game :)

content: Amazing game. The intelligence of the yellow dots should be revised tho, really often they get "stuck" somewhere and they do not work. The classic  situation is when there is left only a mine far from the grinder usually only 2 or 3 are going for new mineral and all the others are chilling... üòê
replyContent: Thanks for reply. If mine is far from production then I recommend to build junkyard (near production) and request some metal there. After that units will start to bring those metal from mine to junkyard (and then from junkyard to other modules) speeding up your production.

content: Awesome game. I bought the pro version to support the developer. The extra levels are pretty nice.
An amazing game when I played free i was expecting to pay 10$ for a game this addictive and enjoyable. Only 1$...  To the creator(s): Thank you so much for doing such an amazing job!
Best game ever. I play this game daily but passive. We need more strategy games like this. Will support your games!
Great game. Very simple and well executed. Love the fact that it carried over my progress from the free version. Well done.
A bit of a steep learning curve in the beginning (I started on the free version), but worth it! Wanted to give the developer their well deserved pay, so bought this "pro" version.

If you're here, you've probably already played the free version. Either way, this is a fantastic game and absolutely worth the dollar!   My only con is that there isn't a "submit bug" feature. Bugs are incredibly rare; I've hit 2 in probably 36 hours of gameplay, but I'd like to be able to log them for the dev when I see them. It's not even a big enough problem to drop it to a 4 star review, but something I'd like to see. Keep up the good work!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Hmm, did it show you some error message or it's just some bug with game mechanics? Anyway, you can just email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about those bugs and I'll take care of them.

content: Really fun game. I'm super stuck on level 141 though... Anybody have any ideas for how to beat it?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Hmm, looks like you're not alone who has been stuck on this level. Please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I'll try to sort out this situation.

content: Great addictive game! Resource and defense challenges will keep the challenge fresh for each stage.

I think this game could be very good, but I think it has a lot of bugs. On level 24 campaign it asks me to sacrifice food to the alter but does not tell me how to do it. After searching for instructions online, it seems the alter is suppose to have some sort of menu (that I do not see). Also, many times I have set my units to 50-50 production and carry, but the units do not move resources at all. Am I missing something?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. That's strange, I opened lvl 24 and task is to produce 70 pearls. Are you sure that you have latest version? About second part: probably that's because of electricity, you just have to build more power stations. I think would be better if you contact me via email (yiotro93@gmail.com), because I am limited by 350 symbols here.

content: Great game.
Any Dev who avoids ads deserves a $ just to reward Civilized behavior

Not being able to connect to connected units, the mine for one, is kinda odd, it's an editor issue, mainly concerning me and a few other editors, also, no real group select feature, as well as a lack of range and impact data on the bomber combined with the pause button not working on airport (I call it bomber) which can result in a planned attack failing, as you can easily missclick and destroy your empire.   Criticism aside, this game is wonderful, full of strategy, and incredibly satisfying to get good at, not liking the art is your own opinion, and I think many will love it's simplicity among other things.   The base building, guarding from enemies, resource management, etc is incredible, definitely worth a shot, easy 9.99/10
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. In next update I will add visual attack radius for bombs. I haven't thought about giving commands to airport while it's paused but you can just pause game itself and it should do the thing. Also, I didn't understand 'Not being able to connect to connected units', do you mean that you can't reunite base once it's split?

replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Ok, I'll make distinct icon for pro version in next update (not including hotfixes)

content: Great game!
Great game. One of very few developers that do not taint their games with ads or in-app payments. Respect.
Great games, keep them going!
This is an outstanding conceptual strategy game. Scratches that itch.
hi dev the game is amazing just wow more things everyday but I would still like enemy bases that you can attack and stuff
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Nice to hear that you liked the update :)

content: Achikaps, like Yiotro's other titles takes an interesting or established strategy concept and builds an incredibly solid framework with endearing minimalist art styles and usually smooth gameplay.   There's still bugs and problems indicative of a new programmer and newcomer to the industry, but his enthusiasm shows through the projects and updates he has done, and I look forward to seeing how Yiotro's career and games develop.
Played the free version for hours and bought this to support devs.   Dev is great at making strategy games. Never has any special permissions or ads either :)

This game scratches an itch that few games can deliver. I love the style of gameplay and im glad there are still developments going on for it. 4.9 out of 5 because sometimes the 'carry' units can be a bit lazy at their jobs.
Perfect smartphone game.
Got to give the guy credit for not putting adverts all over the free games, so paying the tiny amount for this makes good moral sense. The game is a fun little time waster too.

Such an awesome strategy game that's easy on your battery. I highly recommend this game, especially the pro version. It's a little weird at first, but once you understand the basics, it's a lt of fun. There are also 150 scenarios in thecampaign mode. I've played 50 of them so far, and they're very enjoyable. The pacing is spot on too so you won't feel overwhelmed.
Great developer, great games.
Simplistic and super fun! I'd gladly donate to help fostering future updates with new features, new minerals, more complexity etc.

Pro version is DEFINITELY worth it! Doing a great job with the updates! A couple suggestions: allow the player to manually change number of units working on a particular module, so for example, you can tap on Factory then "+ or -" symbols show up and you can tap one to change the number of units for the module. 2nd suggestion: building modules from a platform that has a power station is kind of glitchy... Maybe change the power station so it replaces the platform instead of sticking out from it. Kind of like how fast road is built. So you can build a platform, and then upgrade it to a "power station platform" Great work on the game!!!
Love this game!

Edit 1 28/07/2018 I completed all 150 levels and no more to play, :( By the nice updates, very much appreciated, thank you   after using android for four years, this is the first and only app i decided to buy, totally worth it, good job bro
Love this game. Keeps getting better with the updates. Please add an option to reset the campaign progress so i can play it again and again easily.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Ok, I've noted it down. Probably will be added in next update (if nothing hinders).

content: I got this one to support the developer. He make great games in a nice way.
replyContent: Nice to hear that, thank you for your support :)

content: Every update makes the game better and better. It's definitely worth supporting the developer.
Crashes too often. Just had to hard reset my phone, but I'm going to keep playing anyway
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'm really sorry for that. I've tried to fix it (many times), but with no luck. It does that only on some devices (which I don't have) and it makes it even harder.

content: Having a great time, with only one problem. I'm stuck on level 54 because every one of my production buildings becomes paused and cannot become unpaused. This eventually causes me to run out of resources and lose the level. This isn't the only place this happens. When I play sandbox it happens there too. It's gotten worse in the previous update. Before that, it only affected a newly placed building, but now it does it to all the building at once.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. That's probably because of electricity, I've added it few updates ago. You should build power station and windmill. Also, check out level 20 to learn how it works.

content: The best game I've played so far. Simply brilliant. Cleverly simple. It will make you think! Even better since the update.
Awesome game! Well worth every penny I paid for it. I hope this developer makes more games!
AMAZING FLANTABULOUS BEEEEEUTIFUL WANDERFEL MOOOOOO
Ci piace durante la cacatio

This is a good idea, needs some work on the AI and some fun/usability issues. Palace should give back something (maybe defense?) otherwise you are better off letting it get destroyed. Workers seem buggy when they just wander back and forth and sometimes can't building things because the platform is full.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. The idea about palace is quite good. I've noted it down, thanks. About units AI: It's quite complicated, that's why it still has bugs. I am fixing bugs all the time, but when I add new things it breaks again.

content: Liked the game but not really impressed with the difficulty level. Already at around 40th level but didn't find anythying challenging yet. All the levels feel similar, clearing with exact same strategy. Hence getting kind of bored now. I hope there is something different and more challenging in further levels.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yes, currently there is a problem with difficulty. In the beginning it was impossibly hard. I've made it easier and it's too easy. I'll try to make it harder in next update, hope it helps.

content: Love the game. One of the very few apps that I have bought.  Wanted to support the developer, for he would one of the rare app developer who haven't sold their app space to ads.   The demo was great, the purchased version even better with added levels.
Really enjoying this one. Working my way through the campaign, and am absolutely stuck on level 44. If anyone has any tips....?
replyContent: Thanks for good reply.  I've changed some levels in last update, so try updating. Maybe it would help.

content: Another simple looking, but well balanced RTS. Loads of fun!
very fun game. a must if you like resource management

I really love the game but I'm stuck on the 10th level I cant find the production chain menu. It says on the tutorial that it's in the bottom left menu. But there is no production chain tab when I look. I was wondering if I could get some support.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yeah, that's a mistake. I removed it from there few updates ago. You can just tap on meatgrinder and lab to see their requests. I will remove this false tips in next update, thanks for reporting. (I completely forgot about them).

content: Best android game for lovers of strategic basebuilders.
Not a 'Eco' game player, but this is awesome. Buy it!
Liked it a lot.
Awesome little time killer
Great game
Very clever and satisfying game
Very good game, a bit addictive but it's lacking upgrades or more buildings, even though so good I've bought it and would recommend to anyone
Too easy? I haven't finished all the campaigns because they all seem to be the same. I end up just waiting around. Does it get harder? So much potential...
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I recommend you to try 'sandbox' with enemies. They attack infinitely there.

content: Love the game, got the free version and got the paid version to pay you guys. I wish more game developers were like you guys. Thank you for not filling the app with micro transactions and ads.  Feedback. Can you please move the build button to somewhere else on the screen. I'm on Android and I miss clicked many times on the on-screen home button vs build. The workers sometimes stop carrying stuff to the house. I found a work around where I pause and UN pause the house to get the workers carrying stuff over.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. You can tap slightly above the build button because its 'touch area' is bigger than button itself. About workers: I am trying to fix them for last few months. Situation is slowly getting better. The main problem is that I can't reproduce these bugs on my devices. Maybe your info would help, thanks for report.

content: Simple yet very addictive. Love it!

I love the game. It has quite the learning curve, but once you get past that it is an absolutely brilliant game. Only thing is, I played the free version and then bought the pro version, and all the levels that were in the free version are now locked again. I wish there was some way to start the game where the free version leaves off. Having to replay those levels to reach the new levels is kind of a pain.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. This happens if you deleted usual version before installing pro version. But there is a way to skip levels. Please email me and I will tell you how to do that (it's very easy)

content: Great and addictive game.   My only complaint is that one can't rebuild road to module when it gets stranded (for example platform leading to mine gets destroyed by enemy and there is no way to reconnect to that mine).  EDIT: I've tried couple times, the road refuses to build no matter how close the new platform is.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. UPD: Please update to 1.08d, I fixed this bug.

content: This app is worth the money for the extra levels. It's super fun, and I would love to see a skirmish mode like Antiyoy has.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. The analog of skirmish mode is the sandbox in this game. But if you're talking about combat vs other base then I have to say that it's too hard to make in this game but I plan to make separate game in similar style but more focused on combat.

content: Great game, well worth buying the full version
Great game, although gets super hard super fast. Would love more hints, or a selectable difficulty level. I loved the old "the settlers", and this game has it!
Simple game but very fun to play

Having tried this devs free apps ages ago this was an instant purchase for me as the dev focuses on gameplay. The game reminds me of rymdkapsel and eufloria but is completely different to both those. Thanks for the great game. One thing I would like is colour inversion. I much prefer black colour palette. Too much white gives me headaches
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yeah, I thought about that. The thing is that it requires remaking a lot of graphics. But I think that this is a good idea for update, so I've added it to my plans.

content: Thanks for game, many times when - I play - I try to rotate map, or when I stop some prod. block then I can't use block used resouce, but anyway I like this game
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yeah, once mineral is dropped to production module it's locked by it. This fixes some bugs, so if I change it then I would need to fix them somehow else.

content: Because the developer gave a "no ad" full version of the game, I tried it and loved it, and very happily paid for the pro version.
Awsome
Worth the fee, great little game.
Perfectly done. Love this game.
great
Liked the mission given. Were repetitive but still interesting.
I liked your last game, I am liking this game, here is a small contribution to help you create your next game I will like.
Perfect what i was after! But could do with some more buildings and challenges.
What a great developer and a great game. An interesting challenge based around simple production chains and physical considerations. Buy this game, support this creator!
Such a fantastic little game! Keep up the great work. Simple to get the hang of and addictive. Highly recommended for those who like strategy and puzzle games.
Its a good game i wish you could make your own fighters... anyways the game is great and highly recomended
Its, i drove 20km to get Google play money to buy this, fun
replyContent: Wow, thanks for your support, that's very kind of you :)

content: Hy, road upgrades, stuck here :D i'm sure the solution is simple. Any help pls?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. To upgrade the road you just have to build fast road on top of usual one. Tap on platform, choose 'fast road' and then tap one another platform that is connected with first one.

content: Great Dev

Couldnt get past tutorial 2 it just doesn't let me end am i doinh something wrong? Edit: thank you for the reply i figured out what i was doing wrong. After all the waves ended i hit the fast foward button and it ended the lvl.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Probably you didn't built units. You have to build house and assign some units to 'carry', so that they carry necessary minerals to houses. Also, you can tap on house to see which minerals are needed.

content: I played the free version to level 35 and decided it wasn't going to be enough levels for me so I bought the pro..  Money well spent!  It's easy to learn, but challenging enough to make you think.  I can only think of one thing I'd like, a priority system.  Sometimes the only way I can get my units to take food to the houses is by pausing the laboratory, which isn't a good idea some levels lol.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I have this in plans, but I don't know when I will be able to do that. It's not hard to implement. The only problem is that I suspect that it will cause a lot of bugs

content: Like all great games; simple premises, complex results. It's rapidly changing as features are added and bugs fixed, I'll give it five stars when it's a bit more stable. Edit - five stars, excellent service from developer.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Does the game crash without giving any error?

content: I haven't finished first 50 levels yet, but developer definitely deserves payment!
Very good strategy game pick up the free version to try it out if you don't believe me.
Superb game. The developer really knows what he is doing. Congrats on a great game.
5 Stars - love your strategy games. Paid for Pro
This guy can program !!! And what a great game concept too. Love it. Nicely challenging campaign that gets progressively harder !!  Well done !!!
Awesome but simple
Just no words!  :-)
replyContent: Thanks for your support :) I am planning to add fast forward button in future updates, but now you can force enemies to come by pressing that little button in tasks panel.

content: Found this game from Antiyoy and I love everything he makes. Phenomenal logical games
Love this and all of your other games

Very addictive, easy to master strategy. Sometimes challenging, always enjoyable. And caps off to the Dev who is fast to respond to issues and bugs in this title, which is in its early stages of development. Regular updates just continue to improve this great game. 5/5.

Lots of fun to play, I love the simpleness and it's addictive. One issue, it is also related to junk, and maybe got introduced with your fix today. The junk level 15 will not work, the units just will not carry the steel to the junkyard. I have used burn everything, adjusted sliders, have people set for all 4 roles.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I think it's part of bigger problem with 'carry' workgroup. I am trying hard to fix that. Also, save/load usually helps in this situations, it can be temporal solution for this.

content: Great and interesting game!
Excellent games, keep them coming!

Hey man I bought this version to support you because I love all your games I have a very small suggestion though can you add a wave send function because I'm at level 15 and I've noticed that that in the past ten levels I'm always ready for waves very early and I just sit around doing nothing or walking away from my tablet for 10 minutes so that the waves will be sent to be dealt with by my defences. So just a button I can press to send the next wave would be nice. Keep up the good work man!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I've added this button in one of latest updates. It's located in tasks panel, in top right corner.

content: Glad to be able to support a fantastic developer. I'm glad you showed in antiyoy that this game was out! Was just about to finish up the antiyoy campaign :P Keep up the great work!
Great work on your games! Haven't played this, buying to give support and encouragement to a great developer!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your support.

content: I hope we will be able to force the enemy to come, so that i can save some time.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I plan to add ability to speed up time. Also, I really like your idea, I'll add button to force enemies in future updates.

content: I bought this game to support a great game designer. Keep them coming!
Another great game from Yiotro, will definitely keep supporting!
